sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_c862a42264525910f877e83b89670107
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script>event.parm1 == 'com.snc.universal_request'</condition_script><description/><event_name>plugin.upgraded</event_name><name>Run clean upgrade for Universal Request</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var upgradeEngine = new sn_uni_req.MobileUtahUpgradeEngine();
upgradeEngine.cleanUpgradeLegacyCards();
upgradeEngine.cleanUpgradeButtonInstance();

var gr = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
gr.get("sys_id", "c862a42264525910f877e83b89670107");
if (gr.isValidRecord()) {
    gr.setValue("active", false);
    gr.update();
    gs.info("Disabling the script action as it should only run once.");}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-05 09:12:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c862a42264525910f877e83b89670107</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run clean upgrade for Universal Request</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Universal Request" source="sn_uni_req">c1ddba4773b10010cbb654eb7df6a76b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Universal Request">c1ddba4773b10010cbb654eb7df6a76b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_c862a42264525910f877e83b89670107</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-02-09 18:36:54</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_39eb990377ee511059018f1a5b5a99b7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script>event.parm1 == 'com.snc.universal_request'  ||  event.parm1 == 'sn_scmobile'</condition_script><description/><event_name>plugin.upgraded</event_name><name>Catalog mobile upgrade for UR card</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Starting of catalog mobile upgrade script for universal request card.");
//Primary ticket as task view
var legacyCardMap = {
    "26dc56b6731200105788e1e54cf6a7ab": {
        "sys_sg_form_screen": "25e45ac9bc322010f877b42c9e173b6d",
        "sys_sg_master_item": ""
    }
};
new global.CatalogMobileUpgradeUtil().cleanItemViewUpgrade(legacyCardMap);

gs.info("Completed the catalog mobile upgrade script for universal request card.");


//De activate the script once it is completed the execution

var gr = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
gr.addQuery("sys_id", "39eb990377ee511059018f1a5b5a99b7");
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
    gr.setValue("active", false);
    gr.update();
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-19 12:56:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>39eb990377ee511059018f1a5b5a99b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Catalog mobile upgrade for UR card</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Service Catalog for mobile" source="sn_scmobile">2263a68187032300e0ef0cf888cb0b3f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Service Catalog for mobile">2263a68187032300e0ef0cf888cb0b3f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_39eb990377ee511059018f1a5b5a99b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-02-09 18:36:53</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Catalog mobile upgrade for UR card
